meanings.definition: The final part of a play, movie, or narrative, typically providing a conclusion or resolution.
meanings.sent1: The afterclaps of the movie revealed the fate of the main characters.
meanings.sent2: The audience clapped loudly during the afterclaps of the theater performance.
meanings.sent3: The afterclaps of the story left everyone satisfied with the ending.
meanings.sent4: The afterclaps of the play tied up all loose ends perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The afterclaps of the film left a lasting impression on the viewers.

meanings.definition: A sudden or unexpected event occurring after a previous event or situation.
meanings.sent1: The afterclaps of the party were the arrival of unexpected guests.
meanings.sent2: The afterclaps of the storm caused chaos in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The afterclaps of the meeting caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The afterclaps of the game changed the outcome completely.
meanings.sent5: The afterclaps of the race left everyone in shock.
